shelfButtonInfos.label: Rig Builder
Auto Rigger
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.rigging.autoRigging as ar
import imp
imp.reload(ar)

try:
    arui.close()
    arui.deleteLater()
except:
    pass

arui = ar.ui.mainUI.MainUI()
arui.show()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Advanced Skeleton
shelfButtonInfos.command: source "AdvancedSkeleton.mel";AdvancedSkeleton;

shelfButtonInfos.label: AS Utils
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from AdvancedSkeleton import advancedSkeletonHelperUI as ashUI
import imp
imp.reload(ashUI)

try:
    ashUIObj.close()
except:
    pass

ashUIObj = ashUI.AdvancedSkeletonHelperUI()
ashUIObj.show()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Transfer Values Parent
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Transfer selected transform channel values to the parent.
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.utils.transform as tu
import imp
imp.reload(tu)

sels = pm.selected()
for sel in sels:
    tu.transferValueToParent(sel)
